metadata.title: CVE-2022-34912 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.37.3 and 1.38.x before1.38.1. The contributions-title, used on Special:Contributions, is used aspage title without escaping. Hence, in a non-default configuration where ausername contains HTML entities, it won't be escaped.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
